title: Riot Help!!!
body: Ok so i sumbited some weeks ago a post whitch i was asking for help to change my email to change my password and riot answered me a support ticked whitch i could talk with a rioter to change my email.... And then it needed some information about this account And in needed my old email that i dont even remember and other stuff that i dont remember too.. COME ON RIOT! just help me change my password with another way... please i really need to change it because other people know it too...

replies.body: Hey Riot. I bought Project Jhin but in order to get the border for him on the loading screen, do I have to buy the final icon with the three borders becsue Im confused. Last year it was easier. Pls Help!

You'll first need to verify yourself as the account creator before being able to make changes to the account. If it weren't setup this way, anyone could write in to get your info changed and steal your account. Look over those questions again and do your best to answer the ones you remember.
Then my pass stay's the same.. because i dont remember them..
That’s why they’re asking all the information - they need you to confirm you are the rightful and original owner of the account before they will help you access it.
i just dont remember man, now what i do i stay with the same password?
